quote.msg:
Official: Dembélé has received the medical green light.

Ernesto Valverde will sacrifice Philippe Coutinho for a fourth midfielder against Manchester United. [rac1]

replies.msg:
Piqué: "I remember Ole as a teammate. He was very good as a player and he helped me a lot. He had the quality as a striker to score goals. I'm glad to see him managing his team now."

Piqué: “We (Barça) are playing well, we’re come into good form and we are looking forward to getting a good result ahead of the match at the Camp Nou."

“We'll have to keep an eye out on their strategy and see how they approach the game. United are a very strong tactically. We have to avoid the moves they make and defend well."

“United is the biggest club in England. All teams have good and bad times.”

“We do not feel any pressure. We are very excited to lift the Champions League title again, and we know how difficult it is.”

“I've always had a special appreciation for Manchester United for how they treated me and their style, but now I’m coming with another team (Barça) - the one I've always had in my heart, and the one I always want to win.”

"It's not a special surprise that Madrid are no longer in the competition. They won the Champions League trophies that they have now, but we have won Copas, Leagues and also Champions Leagues as well.”

“PSG was better than United at Old Trafford, but United turned it around in Paris. United are a dangerous team, and we know we have to 'kill' them off in our match if we have the chance."

“Playing at Old Trafford is something unique. The stadium is always full. It’s another culture, another environment, very rich and amazing. It has to be something you live in to understand, it's a joy and a pleasure."

“I have not watched the match last year against Roma. It was very hard on us, of course, but we've also had some good times too.”

“Last year, we learned that we can not let the opponent get into the game at any point of the tie.”

The competition will be held in a regional format in two groups of six teams whose venues will be Argentina and Colombia, countries that will host teams distributed in the South Zone and the North Zone.
The new format includes a total of 38 games and gives the amateur the option to enjoy at least five matches of his selection in a neighboring country and border, which reinforces the show and the sports party.
The South Zone will be integrated by Argentina, Chile, Uruguay, Paraguay, Bolivia and a guest country. The North Zone will be made up of Colombia, Brazil, Venezuela, Ecuador and Peru and another invited selection.

The competition will be held in a regional format in two groups of six teams whose venues will be Argentina and Colombia, countries that will host teams distributed in the South Zone and the North Zone.
The new format includes a total of 38 games and gives the amateur the option to enjoy at least five matches of his selection in a neighboring country and border, which reinforces the show and the sports party.
The South Zone will be integrated by Argentina, Chile, Uruguay, Paraguay, Bolivia and a guest country. The North Zone will be made up of Colombia, Brazil, Venezuela, Ecuador and Peru and another invited selection.
